lines.text: Men don't understand power - they think all it's good for is getting more.

[pouting]
Don't make me upset, or I'll never marry you.
She honestly believes that peasants are as good as we are.

[observing Athalia's torture]
I'm going to like this part when I am queen.
It's not pain that breaks them. It's fear. Knowing that they are absolutely helpless.
[tightens the rack, causing the bare-breasted Princess Athalia to writhe and scream in agony]
You are helpless aren't you? I can do anything I please to you. And there's nothing you can do.
[Athalia moans in pain as Hofrax stretches her again]

[addressing Athalia, who is bound naked to a stretching rack and is being tortured to death]
If you refuse to use the scepter to save yourself, you're certainly never going to give the secret to us. And so Ankaris has relented. He's given me permission to kill you. Ah, I intend to do it very slowly. The secret of the scepter will have to remain a secret.
Sss... so... someday someone will come and stop you... uggglmmph!
Ha ha! Who? One of your rebels? Our soldiers march within the hour to hunt them down.
